com.dropbox.sync.android

Class DbxFileInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dropbox.sync.android.DbxFileInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<DbxFileInfo>

    public final class DbxFileInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<DbxFileInfo>
    Info about a Dropbox file system entry. Can either be a file or a folder.

    DbxFileInfo provides a default comparison with path first, suitable for use in collections.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean isFolder
      Whether this is a folder.
      java.util.Date modifiedTime
      The time that this file was last modified based on the system clock of the local device, not Dropbox's servers.
      DbxPath path
      The path to the file or folder, relative to your app's app folder.
      long size
      The size, in bytes, of the file content.

    • Field Detail

      • path

        public final DbxPath path
        The path to the file or folder, relative to your app's app folder.

      • isFolder

        public final boolean isFolder
        Whether this is a folder.

      • size

        public final long size
        The size, in bytes, of the file content. Undefined for folders.

      • modifiedTime

        public final java.util.Date modifiedTime
        The time that this file was last modified based on the system clock of the local device, not Dropbox's servers. It should not be used to determine if a file has changed, only as a way to order files in the UI or display a modified time.
